name: HPVTest
title: HPV Test
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for human papilloma viruses (HPV).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Laboratory Test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent tests for high-risk HPV in cervical samples.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent tests for high-risk HPV conducted on non-cervical samples and tests that are ordered only.)
